price: هغوى چې لمونځونه ترسره كوي، زكات وركوي او پر آخرت باور كوي.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum yūqinūna
